sentences.en: " Darling Auntie,'she said, " don't let's talk about distressing things like money any more.
sentences.cn: " 好姑妈, " 她说, " 我们别再谈那些关于金钱什么的烦恼事了.

sentences.en: All who saw the distressing scene revolted against it.
sentences.cn: 所有看到这种悲惨景象的人都对此感到难过.

sentences.en: Bullying can indeed be distressing and frightening for those at the receiving end.
sentences.cn: 受到欺凌的人会真实地感到痛苦和害怕。

sentences.en: Her vocal range was, to say the least of it, limited, and she had a distressing tendency to sing flat.
sentences.cn: 至少可以说，她的音域不够宽，而且令人不舒服的是，她总是音高偏低。
他的智力衰退令人苦恼.

sentences.en: It is distressing to see food being wasted like this.
sentences.cn: 这样浪费粮食令人痛心.

sentences.en: It is very distressing to see your baby attached to tubes and monitors.
sentences.cn: 看到你的孩子插着管子，连着监控器，真是令人担忧。

sentences.en: Many men before Gautama in that land of uneventful sunshine had found life distressing and mysterious.
sentences.cn: 在这一片平安无事的,阳光和煦的土地上,早在乔答摩之前就有许多人发现生活是烦恼而神秘的.

sentences.en: My rough beard was distressing me beyond measure.
sentences.cn: 我一脸毛耸耸的胡子令我有说不出的难受.

sentences.en: She had now reached the end of this distressing business.
sentences.cn: 现在,她已经办完了这桩痛苦的交易.

sentences.en: Some intense associations of a most distressing nature were vividly recalled, I think.
sentences.cn: 我认为是某种最痛苦的紧张联想又在记忆中活跃了起来.

sentences.en: Some outraged readers said the story was extremely offensive and distressing.
sentences.cn: 一些感到义愤的读者说这篇报道极为令人反感，而且非常伤人。

sentences.en: The distressing scene revolted all who saw it.
sentences.cn: 令人悲痛的场面使所有目击者都感到不快.

sentences.en: The existentialist thinks it very distressing that God does not exist.
sentences.cn: 存在主义者认为这是非常苦恼的,即上帝不存在.

sentences.en: Tranquillizers help alleviate the distressing symptoms of anxiety.
sentences.cn: 镇静剂有助于缓解焦虑所带来的不安症状。

sentences.en: What is most distressing is how predictable all of this was.
sentences.cn: 令人最烦恼的就是如何提前预知这些.

words.tran_cn: 痛苦的；忧虑的；贫困的；受损的
苦难重重的；使苦恼的；不幸的
使痛苦；使紧张；使困苦（distress的过去分词）
使痛苦的；悲伤的；使烦恼的
使痛苦；迫使（distress的ing形式）；使困苦

phrases.tran_cn: 胎儿宫内窒息，胎儿窘迫
财务困境，财务危机；金融困顿
精神苦闷，精神上的痛苦

trans.tran_cn: 使人痛苦的，令人苦恼的，凄凄惨惨
trans.tran_en: If something is distressing, it upsets you or worries you
